verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לִשְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> lish-Lo-Moh for Solomon אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Except the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִבְנֶ֬ה <S%H1129><s%> yiv-Neh build בַ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> Va-yit, the house שָׁ֤וְא׀ <S%H7723><s%> shav in vain עָמְל֣וּ <S%H5998><s%> 'a-me-Lu they labour בוֹנָ֣יו <S%H1129><s%> vo-Nav that build בּ֑וֹ bo; אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh it except the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> yish-mor- keep עִ֝֗יר <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir, the city שָׁ֤וְא׀ <S%H7723><s%> shav [but] in vain שָׁקַ֬ד <S%H8245><s%> sha-Kad waketh שׁוֹמֵֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer. the watchman

שָׁ֤וְא <S%H7723><s%> shav [It is] vain לָכֶ֨ם׀ la-Chem מַשְׁכִּ֪ימֵי <S%H7925><s%> mash-Ki-mei early ק֡וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum for you to rise up מְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H309><s%> me-'a-cha-rei- late שֶׁ֗בֶת <S%H3427><s%> She-vet, to sit up אֹ֭כְלֵי <S%H398><s%> 'O-che-lei to eat לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem the bread הָעֲצָבִ֑ים <S%H6089><s%> ha-'a-tza-Vim; of sorrows כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten [for] so he giveth לִֽידִיד֣וֹ <S%H3039><s%> li-di-Do his beloved שֵׁנָֽא׃ <S%H8142><s%> she-Na. sleep

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat [are] an heritage יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim; Lo children שָׂ֝כָ֗ר <S%H7939><s%> Char, [is his] reward פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri [and] the fruit הַבָּֽטֶן׃ <S%H990><s%> hab-Ba-ten. of the womb

כְּחִצִּ֥ים <S%H2671><s%> ke-chitz-Tzim As arrows בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- [are] in the hand גִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor; of a mighty man כֵּ֝֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, So בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei so [are] children הַנְּעוּרִֽים׃ <S%H5271><s%> han-ne-'u-Rim. of the youth

אַשְׁרֵ֤י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Happy הַגֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> hag-Ge-ver, [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose מִלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> mil-Le full אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַשְׁפָּת֗וֹ <S%H827><s%> ash-pa-To, that hath his quiver מֵ֫הֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem like לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu; of them they shall not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When יְדַבְּר֖וּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-be-Ru but they shall speak אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אוֹיְבִ֣ים <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vim with the enemies בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> bash-Sha-'ar. in the gate
